description: This repository contains my complete resources and coding practices for malware development using Rust 🦀.
Sketch and take handwritten notes.
Tantivy is a full-text search engine library inspired by Apache Lucene and written in Rust
A collection of Solana programs maintained by Solana Labs
An extremely fast Python linter and code formatter, written in Rust.
💥 Blazing fast terminal file manager written in Rust, based on async I/O.
An extremely fast Python package installer and resolver, written in Rust.
Anki's shared backend and web components, and the Qt frontend
🦀 Small exercises to get you used to reading and writing Rust code!
A native Rust library for Delta Lake, with bindings into Python

A Virtual Machine Monitor for modern Cloud workloads. Features include CPU, memory and device hotplug, support for running Windows and Linux guests, device offload with vhost-user and a minimal compact footprint. Written in Rust with a strong focus on security.
Incremental bundler and build system optimized for JavaScript and TypeScript, written in Rust – including Turbopack and Turborepo.
A toolchain for web projects, aimed to provide functionalities to maintain them. Biome offers formatter and linter, usable via CLI and LSP.
Cross-platform Rust rewrite of the GNU coreutils
Self-hosted AI coding assistant
Linux AMDGPU Controller
Rust-based WebAssembly bindings to read and write Apache Parquet data
A terminal workspace with batteries included
This is the Rust course used by the Android team at Google. It provides you the material to quickly teach Rust.
zkSync era
A modern, maintained replacement for ls
Code for "Zero To Production In Rust", a book on API development using Rust.
A private blockDAG using Homomorphic Encryption with Smart Contract support
Hayabusa (隼) is a sigma-based threat hunting and fast forensics timeline generator for Windows event logs.
A fast Rust-based web bundler 🦀️
